name: HELIUM (itch) (jakeharris)
description:
Every month, as they have been commanded, the digging clans send an adult on a Dive. This person will not come back home. They will drill down, and forward, and they will either die or find their Promised Land, the CORE.

Controls:

  • Up Arrow: Move forward/drill. Also moves through text boxes.
  • Left Arrow: Use coolant
  • Down Arrow: Wait for a turn
  • Right Arrow: Use drill repair tools
  • Space: Select things in the shop

My entry for LD48 (theme: Deeper and Deeper).
